This is not a really good game, it's not realistic, it's good if you want to learn the basics, but for people who already know the basics it's too easy, for people who want challenges, get RORTOS extreme landings

First, I *am* a pilot.  This is absolutely nothing like flying.  The physics are completely inaccurate.  If you want to kill some time and have fun, this is a good GAME.  This is not a simulator, far from it.

My 6-yr old loves airplane games and this app is great for him to look around at the entire plane. Controls are easy but it crashes at the end of every mission no matter what the outcome. Frustrating to have to restart the app for every mission
I drove the plane like a pilot!

title.label: F Y I hoochie mama pilots..... If this is intended for kids...

content.label: I acquired this game was excited to try it and share with my boys a fun non shooter but the first screen has the pilot choice and one right there was a plastic barbie with breast implants and not enough money after her surgery for clothing.   To each his own but not when you a responsible parent so watch out parents.
It's a wonderful game but why does it crashes after each play?!

The game is not realistic. It is good for beginners, but if you already have experience, this is not the game for you. For example, it is impossible to stall, there is no airbrake, no flaps,and no controllable landing gear.  If you are one of the more experienced people, then you should try Rortos' Extreme Landings. It is way more realistic. If you are still a beginner, you could learn the basics here.

This is an awesome app. I love playing except that it crashes at the end of each play. Whether you crash your airplane or pass the level, the app crashes. I still go back in to play again because it's so fun. But it would be nice if that was fixed.
It was good the first time I had it. But now it crashes every time I play.

A simulator simulates physics and real flight.  This game is not tied in reality.  It is a good game though, just not a good flight simulator.  Gravity and airspeed are not factored properly, nor is normal realitivity.  Not saying the game is bad...
I actually enjoy the process of landing the most. It's always kind of stressful trying to angle the plane and taxi it over to the right spot, but it makes for a decent game.

As a person who want to be a pilot, this game sure is amazing to let me experience such feeling of joyness when taking off/landing an airplane. All the planes available are on point, they all looks awesome but if some more aircrafts could added, that'd be much appreciated. No bug/lag by far and it's very stable even when playing with an iPhone 4. If you want to experience the feeling of "walking" on the air, you definitely need to download this game.
Add more levels yes please.
